name: Way Back Home
storyline: An outbreak follows the main Protagonist, Tenriyu Amuro. A father went to the manila for a job for his familly after he leaves their province. Only to find himself in the middle of chaos where a virus causes Agression, Hunger And Violence to humans. He must fight his way back home and escaped the quarantined city in the final battle of the story... Amuro and General Zeguire dukes it out to see who would win in a battle in the zombie infested city.
summary: A post apocalyptic survival horror game in the middle of an outbreak follows the main Protagonist, Tenriyu Amuro. A father went to the manila for a job for his familly after he leaves their province. Only to find himself in the middle of chaos where a virus causes Agression, Hunger And Violence to humans. He must fight his way back home and escaped the quarantined city.
